def main():
    def D(N):
        return sum(map(lambda x:int(x) if int(x)%2 else 2*int(x),str(N)))%10
    for T in xrange(int(raw_input())):
        a,b=map(int,raw_input().split())
        a=a-1 if a else 0
        ans_a=(a//10)*45+sum(map(D,xrange((a//10)*10,a+1)))
        ans_b=(b//10)*45+sum(map(D,xrange((b//10)*10,b+1)))
        print ans_b-ans_a
main()
